title: 'How We Survive': Journalist-turned-VC Molly Wood on climate tech | Greenbiz - GreenBiz
content: 'How We Survive': Journalist-turned-VC Molly Wood on climate tech | Greenbiz  GreenBiz
description: When it comes to the climate crisis, we need to explore all available solutions, even those that aren’t ‘perfect,’ says long-time radio journalist and podcaster Molly Wood.
